description:
xBIM Essentials is the core part of the toolkit that deals with reading and writing IFC data files. It does not contain support for geometric operations and 3D visualation. Use xBIM 3D if you need support for geometry and presentation, its also open source.
xBIM is an Open Source Toolkit for developing IFC based applications (BuildingSmart Data model). 
It provides full support for reading and writing geometry, topology and data in accordance with the Ifc2x3 schema.
xBIM reads and writes Ifc, IfcXMl and IfcZip formats and will convert models to COBie spreadsheets in both UK and US cultures.
A range of 3D viewing controls are provided for use with Windows forms, WPF, WEBGL and OpenGL platforms.
IOS and Android versions are under development.
releaseNotes: This version builds for Any CPU.
summary: The .Net toolkit for developing BIM applications based on the IFC standard.
title: Xbim Essentials
